project_descr: Building National Capacity in Human Resources, Local Government and Sustainable Development: The project builds on the work of the Development of Small-Scale Enterprises for Income and Employment Creation Project - Phase II, which began in June 2004.

outputs.output_descr: The Project provides support to the Turks and Caicos Island Government in fulfilling with key national development priorities. These are focused on building capacity to support small and micro enterprises throughout the island, strengthening the capacity of local governance actors to manage local affairs, improving national capacity to implement and monitor environment and disaster management programs.

project_title: tci building nat. capacity in hr, local gov't & sus. dev
